title: 820-4924 Boots but no fan spin
message:
This one was liquid damaged, the keyboard backlight connector was the only visible damage, apart from that it boots fine, but no fan spin.

Measured Q6060 it has:
Pin 1 - 3.37mv on gate 
Pin 2 - 3.3v on source
Pin 3 - 3.37mv on drain

Swapped it out but same measurements.

R6061 is good.

What should I be getting on SMC_FAN_0_CTL ?

title: 820-4924 Boots but no fan spin
message: The fan does not spin until it gets hot, stress it and see if fan spins....

title: 820-4924 Boots but no fan spin
message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 4757"]The fan does not spin until it gets hot, stress it and see if fan spins....[/QUOTE]

Is that true? Every other machine I have worked on, the fan starts with POST. Anyway not the issue here, I thinking SMC_FAN_0_CTL should be higher and my SMC maybe the issue.

title: 820-4924 Boots but no fan spin
message: Newer machines only spin up when warm.
